name: PowertechAPPSPOWER
0:
”Alexa Turn On The Light”
”Alexa Turn Off The Light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
First, you need at least one Powertech Wi-Fi Smart Plug. If you do have one, please follow the procedures:
1. Install APPSPOWER app on Android or iOS app
2. Sign up an APPSPOWER account via APPSPOWER app
3. Set up a Powertech Wi-Fi Smart Plug
4. Tap on [Enable Skill] to add an APPSPOWER skill to your Alexa App and link your APPSPOWER account with your Amazon Echo account
5. Go to “Smart Home” from the side menu of the Alexa app
6. Tap on [Discover devices] to search your Powertech
Wi-Fi Smart Plug
7. Add your Powertech Wi-Fi Smart Plug to the Alexa app
